settings.main.name: Enable Isometric Perspective
settings.main.hint: Toggle whether the isometric perspective is applied to the canvas.
settings.height.name: Enable Height Adjustment
settings.height.hint: Toggle whether token sprites adjust their position to reflect their elevation.
settings.visuals.name: Enable Token Visuals
settings.visuals.hint: Displays a circular shadow and a vertical red line to indicate token elevation. Requires 'Enable Height Adjustment' to be active.
settings.debug.name: Enable Debug Mode
tab.Isometric.name: Isometric
scene.transform.name: Transform Background Image.
scene.transform.hint: Apply isometric transformation to the background image.
scene.scale.name: Isometric Scale.
scene.scale.hint: Adjust scale of art in isometric mode (Range: 0.5x to 3x). The 'Offset Background (Pixels)' in Grid tab can be used to shift/move the background.
token.enableIsometric.name: Disable Isometric Token.
token.enableIsometric.hint: Disable isometric transformation on this token.
token.artOffset.name: Art Offset.
token.artOffset.hint: Offset the token art position in pixels.
token.scale.name: Isometric Scale.
token.scale.hint: Adjust scale of token art when in isometric perspective (0.01x to 3x).
tile.enableIsometric.name: Disable Isometric Tile.
tile.enableIsometric.hint: Disable isometric transformation on this tile.
tile.artOffset.name: Art Offset.
tile.artOffset.hint: Offset the tile art position in pixels.
tile.scale.name: Isometric Scale.
tile.scale.hint: Adjust scale of tile art when in isometric perspective (0.01x to 3x).
tile.flip.name: Flip Tile.
tile.flip.hint: Flip the tile art horizontally. Works only with isometric transformation on.
